description: Don't let icy sidewalks or snowy trails prevent you from going where you want, when you want. These low-profile traction spikes have strong tungsten carbide spikes underfoot that bite deep into hard snow or solid ice.7 tungsten carbide spikes per foot bite into ice and hard packed snow.Rubber straps fit easily on a wide range of shoe types.For hiking boots , add one size to your shoe size for proper fit.For insulated boots, add two sizes to your shoe size for proper fit.
name: IceTrekkers Spikes Traction - Unisex
